message: Hello! I’m here to help you find the best mental health chatbot for your needs. I'll ask you some questions to understand your preferences. If at any point you wish to stop, type 'done'.

Final Recommendation: Based on your preferences, I recommend using Woebot. It is an AI-driven chatbot that focuses on cognitive-behavioral therapy techniques and has been proven effective in helping users manage their mental health. It also offers personalized support and a variety of tools and resources to help you track your progress. Give it a try and let me know how it works for you. Remember, it is important to also seek professional help for any mental health concerns. Take care.
